rev.comment: Undid revision 460899747 by [[Special:Contributions/Emptyexistence|Emptyexistence]] ([[User talk:Emptyexistence|talk]])I don't think we need to turn this section into a list. Two very notable ones are enough
/* See also */ link is a redirect
/* Psychological aspects */ added comment about why people gamble
/* Psychological aspects */ added comment about the gambling "high"
These tokens pick together those right and left of them so that these can only be divided, again, when the inserted code is removed.
